I thought about this some more and now I'm wondering we need to do 
somethi=
ng special for the batch creation of a single resource.

We have no problem=
 doing batch GETs i.e. when you do a GET on a factory-
type resource, it re=
turns a list of representations for each that type 
of the resource e.g. GE=
T /Books will return a list of books.  What is 
wrong with POST'ing multipl=
e representations to a factory resource?

Thanks.
